plot: Myeong-su meets a girl on a rural island while he is on vacation. He marries her and takes her back to live in his parent's home. Her mother-in-law views it as a unequal match and maltreats the girl in the hope that she will leave.
title: Biryeonui seom
plot_es: Myeong-su meets a girl on a rural island while he is on vacation. He marries her and takes her back to live in his parent's home. Her mother-in-law views it as a unequal match and maltreats the girl in the hope that she will leave.
plot_en: Myeong-su meets a girl on a rural island while he is on vacation. He marries her and takes her back to live in his parent's home. Her mother-in-law views it as a unequal match and maltreats the girl in the hope that she will leave.
